visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: Monthly Sales Data, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark gray color (#333) for axis labels and titles, with a font size of 12px for labels and 14px for titles, Data series: Include one series named 'Sales' with data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4], Custom colors: Use a blue color (#4287f5) for the columns, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color (#f4f4f4), add a legend at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50px top, 100px right, 50px bottom, and 100px left.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart with specific styling and data. The chart type is set to 'column', and the title is 'Monthly Sales Data'. The axes labels and titles are styled with a dark gray color and appropriate font sizes. The data series includes one series named 'Sales' with the specified data points, and the columns are colored blue. Additional configurations include setting the chart background to light gray, positioning the legend at the bottom of the chart, and adjusting the chart margins for better spacing.
